alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 19 at 2:30PM MST until December 21 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 65 mph possible. Locally higher gusts are possible in the gaps of the eastern Absaroka Range foothills. * WHERE...Cody Foothills including WY Hwy 120 and the benches from Cody to Clark WY. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down power lines and ignite fires. Travel could be dangerous, especially for high profile vehicles on north-south oriented roads.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
